Name: Phaethon's Melody
Desc4: When any squad member uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency increases by 45 for 8s. If the character using the <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is not the equipper, the equipper's <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> is increased by 25%.
Story: A peculiar Drive Disc created by fanatical followers of Phaethon. The eccentric singer repeats an odd melody with a strange voice, striving to spread the legendary deeds of "Lord Phaethon."
